description: This course will cover every important concept necessary to become a winning chess players, and more importantly the learning will be done in under 30 minutes of video, with an additional quiz here and there if you want to make sure you are on track. Throughout 15 episodes of 90 seconds each this course will cover the rules of chess, both basic and advanced, the guide to how trading pieces works, how to make the most of sacrifices, how to build an effective defensive force, how to use every single piece correctly and efficiently, how to set up checkmates, how to execute the checking sequences, how to win any endgame, and if that fails, how to draw.
title: Quickfix Chess - Learn Chess In Under An Hour
